name: HELLFRONT: HONEYMOON
description: HELLFRONT: HONEYMOON is an intense twin-stick action strategy game, to be enjoyed with friends over a six-pack of fruit juice. One screen, one winner. Welcome to the HELLFRONT.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 64-bit Processor: 2.4Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 Controller and other XInput-compatible controllers
